snippet: After resisting formally tying the knot for about two decades, President Nicolás Maduro and Cilia Flores were married on Monday, Mr. Maduro announced.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Nicolas Maduro marries his longtime companion Cilia Flores.
lead_paragraph: After resisting formally tying the knot for about two decades, President Nicolás Maduro and Cilia Flores were married on Monday, Mr. Maduro announced.

headline.main: The President of Venezuela Weds His ‘First Combatant’
headline.print_headline: The President of Venezuela Weds His ‘First Combatant’
